record.field: Report "%(report)s" must be cancelled before deletion.
The next invoices are related with SII books: %(invoices)s. If you edit them take care if you need to update again to SII
The next invoices are related with SII books on draft state.
There are some reports in draft and/or confirmed. Any report won't be created until this reports will be processed.
The party of the invoice %(invoice)s must has a valid Tax Identifier.
The invoice %(invoice)s has wrong subjected and opertion sii combination.
The party [%(party)s] of the invoice %(invoice)s must has a valid SII Identifier [VAT (only for intracommunity operators)].
You can not set to draft invoice "%(invoice)s" because the SII state is "%(sii_state)s". Please first include the invoice in a Delete Invoice SII Book and send to AEAT.
Invoice "%(invoice)s" was sent to SII and the state is "%(sii_state)s". Please remember after posting to send it again with a Modify SII Book.
Cannot modify "%(fields)s" on invoice "%(invoice)s" because its SII state is "%(sii_state)s". Please first include the invoice in a Delete Invoice SII Book and send to AEAT.
